name: Chickpea Quinoa Power Bowl
description: Plant-based protein powerhouse with chickpeas and quinoa. Vegan, filling, and nutritious.

instructions.instruction: Cook quinoa in 2 cups water for 15-18 minutes.
Toss chickpeas with 1 tbsp olive oil, cumin, paprika, and salt.
instructions.tip: Dry chickpeas well for crispier results.

instructions.instruction: Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes until crispy.
Make tahini dressing: Whisk tahini, lemon juice, remaining olive oil, garlic, and 2 tbsp water.
Fluff cooked quinoa with a fork.
Divide quinoa into bowls. Add spinach.
Top with roasted chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, onion, and avocado.
Drizzle with tahini dressing and serve.

tips: Chickpeas combined with quinoa provide complete protein.
Perfect for meal prep - keeps well for 4 days.
Add cottage cheese for extra protein.
storageInfo: Store dressing separately. Refrigerate for up to 4 days.
servingSuggestion: Serve warm or cold - great for lunch boxes.
variations: Add grilled chicken for extra protein.
